It's a good game with shitty player base. I really hate all the russians in this game. I'm rasist but for some odd reason this nation doesn't know how to play the game. I've had several instances that count on one of my hands that russians were talkative  and know what to do. And also the VAC system isn't good at all. So many people cheat and don't get banned. But for some odd reason again I still love the game I just don't recommend that you get in it as much as me.
